PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06142022-06-02HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act (Surface Coating Materials)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA CONSUMER PRODUCT SAFETY ACT (SURFACE COATING MATERIALS) in order to (1) expand the meaning of a surface coating material to include surface coating materials that do not “dry” on application; (2) expand the application for other decorative coating materials that may be applied to products during manufacture to include materials; (3) expand the 90 mg/kg total lead limit in surface coating materials applied to all furniture; (4) limit the restrictions on lead, mercury and certain other harmful elements in surface coating materials applied to parts of products that are accessible; and (5) require testing to be done in accordance with a method that conforms to good laboratory practices.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0122 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment
